long_desc.thetext: imapflags extension should be updated to imap4flags defined in RFC 5232 notify extension should be update to enotify defined in RFC 5435

I've implemented imap4flags and it's been merged to master. I have also implemented the variables extension, but have not merged it yes, since I'm massaging the commits.
I won't be implementing the enotify extension, but if someone is implementing it, I will be happy to implement the :encodeurl modifier to the set action, specified in the spec, copied below.
RFC 5435 (Sieve Extension: Notifications)
6. Modifier encodeurl to the 'set' Action
Usage: ":encodeurl"
When the Sieve script specifies both "variables" [Variables] and "enotify" capabilities in the "require", a new "set" action modifier (see [Variables]) ":encodeurl" becomes available to Sieve scripts. This modifier performs percent-encoding of any octet in the string that doesn't belong to the "unreserved" set (see [URI]). The percent-encoding procedure is described in [URI].
